channel.title: How to change the text in the load bar
channel.description: how do i change the colour of the loading bar and the text contained within it also the colour of the text above it thanks also i am using a client with sprites if that helps

item.title: How to change the text in the load bar
item.dc:creator: @mrbob1219 mrbob1219
item.description:
@mrbob1219 wrote:

[quote=“This is not an Alt :P, post:8, topic:201214”]sorry i didn’t see

go into client.java for ur client look for the loading thing and add a color like @red@ or @gre@ or sumthin like that[/quote]

lol i wasnt talking about his source but good thing u figured out lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2008, 07:25:57 PM[/size][hr][quote=“g-a-m-e-r-x, post:9, topic:201214”]oi this is nnot an alt please advise how to change the \colours of the loading bar please thanks :P[/quote]

soz i dont know how to change loading bar just the words
